thread.section_title: Fastport Passport Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fastport Passport | fastportpassport.com
thread.title: Michael K
thread.title_full: Fastport Passport reviewed by Michael K

author: Michael K
title: Michael K
text:
I needed a 24-hour turnaround on an expired passport and put my trust in Fastport's hands. Madeleine served as my main contact. She called me immediately following my online order was placed. She explained the processed thoroughly mentioning that every minute counted. We even had to work around a national holiday, NO PROBLEM. She went above and beyond to ensure my passport arrived to me by 8:00am the day of my trip. Well done! I have already told all of my colleagues of the experience. I did my homework on this company. They have an A+ rating from the BBB and it's legit!! Great experience, considering the circumstances.
Michael K.
